title: Chaute u Isua en ru
lyrics:
Chaute u, Isua en r'u,
In en chuan in dam ang;
Lalpa thiltih chu en r'u,
In dam ang.
Thinga khai kan chu en r'u,
In en chuan in dam ang,
"Min en r'u," a ti, ngai r'u,
In dam ang.

Lalpa khai kan chu en r'u,
En rawh u, a hnai reng e,
Enin nung r'u, engah nge
In thih ang?

Sualin bawlhhlawh mah ula,
In en chuan in dam ang;
Mahni leh sual hawisan r'u,
In dam ang.
Setana bawih fo pawhin,
En sela, an dam ang;
"Min en r'u, in chhandam nan,"
In dam ang.

Vak bo daih tawh mah ula,
In en chuan in dam ang;
Rilru sak tinem ula,
In dam ang.
In pa'n a koh che u chu,
In dam nan en rawh u;
A duh a piang lo kal r'u,
In dam ang.
